trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示将用来处理 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件时才会发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>设置属性或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by a row's current state or the values it contains.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件非常有用，如果你想要显示由行的当前状态或它包含的值的快捷菜单。

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a row unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> overrides the shortcut menu for the specific cell that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 当处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>指定处理程序中的快捷菜单显示事件，每当用户右键单击某一行除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>重写被单击的特定单元格的快捷菜单。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>每当也会发生事件的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性检索时，或者以编程方式或当用户右键单击某一行。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性以确定它包含的值或行的状态，使用此信息来更改或修改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使用行的值初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>属性，该事件值重写属性。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> value for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件使用大量的数据，若要避免设置行的性能损失时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>为多行值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventHandler> 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: In the following code example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event is handled to provide a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> based on the title of the employee.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的代码示例中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>处理事件以提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>基于员工的标题。

trans-unit.source: In this example, two there are two context menus, one for managers and one for all other employees.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，两个有两个上下文菜单、 经理和所有其他员工。
